title: RHONJ's Melissa Gorga
description:
RHONJ star and “Melissa Gorga On Display” podcast host, Melissa Gorga, has plenty to say about the upcoming season of Real Housewives, and why it’s gonna be the most drama-filled one yet! She gets candid about the confessionals, her extended family, her sex life with Joe, their fighting style, how they’re still going strong 17-years later, and why she’s more worried now about her teenage kids listening to her podcast than being on reality TV. Melissa also talks fashion, starting her own clothing boutique, Envy, and how she balances career, motherhood, and marriage. Plus, Lala has stories from her recent girls night, and shares how she’s feeling about her post-baby bod, and the thought of having sober sex with someone new.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
